snippet.title: Vampire Bikers Rule The Road In The New Episode Of Eerie Animated Web Series Ghost Radio
snippet.content:
Image:
In May, we shared Ghost Radio, about a late-night radio show wafting over the airwaves from the monster-choked town of Kirlian. Episode two is here, and it's another tale of terror, titled "Masters of the Night."
In this instalment, a motorist stranded in Kirlian overnight encounters a scary group of bikers who menace the town - and making matters worse, they have some crucial things in common with the gang from The Lost Boys. Or do they?
There'll be a new episode of Ghost Radio every three months; follow for updates.
WATCH MORE: Entertainment News
